TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kuxan, title = Kuxan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kuxan} }

S.FORM: Kuxan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Kuxan a niyaro', 51 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 142 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 90%, roma 4%.

Koxan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Koxan a niyaro', 51 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 142 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 90%, roma 4%.
